name: Corsario
description:
Gameplay Video Description

Cosario follows a small group of pirates led by their daring Captain and heedful First Mate (Plus a heedless Gunner and bold Sailing Master), with only a small fighting force as their boarding party and main offense.  Stuck in the middle of islands of the Carribean, the fleets of the English, other Pirates, and some defenseless sugar trade ships, the crew can ask one question: Where to, Captain?

This is a refined, expanded version of the demo we posted before. With more sprites, music, fights, and more, this will be far more interesting and far more fun than the demo from before. What do you do with the drunken sailor? toss 'em overboard!

Goal

Explore the world with your sugar trade pirate crew, avoid the English fleets, and stop the governor!

Controls

Arrow Keys - Movement.

F - Action Key.

Escape - Pause.

Shift - Speed up dialogue.

Return - Advance Dialogue.
